QuestData.Title: Speak Orcish, Man!
QuestData.Description: <Brann begins gesticulating wildly and rambling in his native language.>$B$BRuk MogOth red a mogoth ta eft Thros-garE Haldir.$B$BKha gor ruk khaz ta ke ruk hrim eft thros-am-kha ruk kost-um havar go kost.$B$BA modoss hine ruk bergum eft thros-am-kha ga eft Haldir ke loch Thon we lo gefrunon ta mitta.$B$B Gar Ruk dagUm loch angor-magi ta har ruk!$B$B<After a few moments, you realize the conversation is going nowhere. Perhaps the shaman, Moteha Windborn, at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site will know what to do.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Moteha Windborn at the Grom'arsh Crash-Site.
QuestData.RewardText: Boktar will not be happy that you didn't find Brann, but at least you didn't come back empty-handed. Now, let's see what we can do about this babbling dwarf.
